snippet: After his mother died, Lamont Foxhall, who lives with depression and arthritis, recalls his mother’s voice on a recording for strength when he needs it most.
abstract: Lamont Foxhall of Harlem was given assistance by Brooklyn Community Services to secure funds to help him move his mother's possessions from her apartment after her death; Brooklyn Community Services is one of agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: After his mother died, Lamont Foxhall, who lives with depression and arthritis, recalls his mother’s voice on a recording for strength when he needs it most.

headline.print_headline: Grieving the Loss of His Mother and a Longtime Home
headline.main: After Losing His Mom, He Finds the Will to Move On

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
